attributes.action: Look again at the NERC bill and stop quoting the standard responses usd at the time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NERC bill was a whitewash, and the response given to the recent petition which raised 7100 signatures was brushed aside with the same standard response used during the NERC debate. We insist that you take this issues seriously and will not give in.
